content.description: Climb a chimney, and follow a hand crack to the top (huge slung block anchor).
content.protection: A singles rack 0.5-3", and doubles of 1 and 2 are helpful.
content.location: It is on the right side of the cliff in the left-facing corner.

content.description: Climb a steep hand crack up an arete to the top. Build a gear anchor.
content.protection: A singles rack 0.4-4" with doubles of hand-size pieces.
content.location: It is on the far right side of the cliff.

content.description: Climb a flake to a hand crack that widens to offwidth at the top. Build a gear anchor.
content.protection: A sngles rack 0.4-4". Doubles of hand-size are nice.
content.location: It is on the far right side of the cliff. Start atop a big boulder.

content.description: Climb offwidth to hands/fists to the top.
content.protection: A singles rack 0.3-4". Doubles of hand-size are helpful.
content.location: It is on the center right of the cliff.

content.description: Climb the left of 2 splitter cracks. Climb offwidth to thin hands that widens to fists at the top. This is slightly steeper than the crack to the right.
content.protection: A singles rack 0.3-4". Doubles of hand-size are nice.
content.location: It is on the center right side of the cliff.

content.description: Climb the right of the 2 obvious thin cracks. Climb past a bolt to gain a thin crack. Follow it to the top. Step left to a bolted anchor.
content.location: It is in the center of the cliff.

content.description: Climb the left of the 2 obvious thin cracks.
content.protection: A singles rack 00-2". Doubles of 00-0.4 and brass are helpful.
content.location: It is on the left side of the cliff.

content.description: Follow a splitter hand crack. Stay right when wall steepens and splits into two cracks. Follow it to the top and a bolted anchor.
content.protection: A singles rack 0.5-4". Doubles of hand-size are nice.
content.location: It is on the left side of the cliff.

content.description: Climb a hand crack to easier terrain. Follow this to top (bolted anchor).
content.location:
It is on the left side of the cliff. Do the same start as

Route 2

.

content.description: Climb a chimney to a tips crack. Here, go left following a fist/hand crack that narrows to the top (bolted anchor).
content.location:
It is in the middle of the cliff. Use the same start as

Route 10

.

content.description: Climb a chimney to tips crack past a horizontal to the top (bolted anchor).
content.location: It is in the center of the cliff.

content.description: Climb a flake to a tips crack. When the crack trends right, go left on amazing face holds, clip a bolt, and climb to the top and a bolted anchor.
content.protection: A singles rack 00-0.5. A pink tri-cam is helpful.
content.location: This is on the far left side of the cliff.
